h3.span: HOW TO SUBSCRIBE TO YOUR CHILDâ€™S ACTIVITY SCHEDULES AND PRACTICES

p.span: Â Â Â You no longer have to type in your son and daughterâ€™s practice times, game schedules, band, choir concerts and more! Click on the link below for instructions on how to subscribe to all our school calendars so they show up directly on your phone, tablet or computer calendars.

div.h1: Lake of the Woods School SMS
div.h6: Simply text to 67587 with Y for yes and N for no.

div.h1: Lake of the Woods School Board Meetings
div.h6:
Held the 4th Monday of every month.
